events_detail.description: Severe flooding has struck Chiang Mai, displacing families and causing extensive damage to homes and infrastructure. Volunteers are needed to help distribute essential supplies, assist in evacuation, and support relief efforts.

Volunteers are urgently needed to assist with evacuation efforts and provide support to families affected by the devastating wildfires in the Maule region. Duties include distributing food and water, offering first aid, and assisting with evacuation logistics. Your help will be crucial in ensuring the safety and well-being of those impacted by the fires.
Join us in cleaning up the beaches of Phuket to protect marine life and maintain the beauty of our natural environment. Volunteers will be provided with cleaning tools and safety gear.
